title: Buy Levi Strauss Stock Because Innovation Creates a ‘Brand Halo’
text:
Levi Strauss & Co. stock was rising on Tuesday, helped by a bullish initiation from Macquarie, which thinks that the denim and apparel maker has plenty of runway for growth and room to be generous with shareholders.

The back story. Levi Strauss (ticker: LEVI) made its public debut in March, at $17 a share, and while it did jump to nearly $25 at one point, the stock has largely languished since. The shares dropped following its earnings report in July, and the company’s most-recent results, from earlier this month, also...
description: Macquarie thinks the denim and apparel maker has plenty of runway for growth and room to be generous with shareholders.
